levelList.name: Contre Attaque
levelList.desc:
If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 2 or more, Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Consume 10 [Breath] Count. Gain [Breath] equal to [Breath] Count consumed.
[WinDuel] If this unit conducted a [OneOnOneDuel] with the target Slot's Attack Skill, Inflige 1 [Vulnerable] On Hit (Twice per turn)

levelList.name: Contre Attaque
levelList.desc:
If this unit's Speed is higher than the target's, Coin Power +1 for every 2 Speed difference (Max 3)
[WinDuel] Consume 10 [Breath] Count. Gain [Breath] equal to [Breath] Count consumed. Against targets with [DuelDeclaration_Sinclair], gain [Breath] equal to ([Breath] Count consumed x 2) instead
[WinDuel] If this unit conducted a [OneOnOneDuel] with the target Slot's Attack Skill, Inflige 1 [Vulnerable] On Hit (Twice per turn)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target has 10+ [Combustion], inflict 2 [Combustion] against (# of highest Reson.) random enemies

levelList.name: Blazing Strike
